1c97db76302e43c3837c03b5908b1a5a.title: Zatarain’s® Cheddar Garlic Biscuit Mix
1c97db76302e43c3837c03b5908b1a5a.description:
These biscuits? To die for. Serve ‘em warm, flaky and fresh from the oven. Made with simple ingredients, you can feel good serving them at your family meal. Take the cheesy, garlicky taste over the top with crumbled, cooked bacon or jalapeño add-ins.
 • Just add Cheddar cheese, milk and butter
 • Makes  12 moist, flaky biscuits
 • Serve ‘em alongside Zatarain’s Gumbo or any hearty soup
 • No artificial flavors or colors, no preservatives, no partially hydrogenated oils
 • Made-from-scratch-taste in half the time
1c97db76302e43c3837c03b5908b1a5a.ingredient_text:
ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC
ACID), LEAVENING (SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BICARBONATE, CORN STARCH, MONOCALCIUM PHOSPHATE), GARLIC, WHEY (MILK),
GRANULAR CHEESE (MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), SALT, ONION, NATURAL FLAVOR, PARSLEY, SODIUM PHOSPHATE, BLUE CHEESE
(MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES) & CHEDDAR CHEESE (MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES).

368a45534c0b437d8e840e83033ad308.title: ZATARAIN'S® Buttermilk Biscuit Mix
368a45534c0b437d8e840e83033ad308.description:
Not much can beat these fresh-from-the-oven biscuits! Made with simple ingredients, they’re a side you can feel good about serving at your next family meal. Make ‘em straight out of the box, or customize with ingredients like chopped jalapeños or shredded Cheddar cheese. 
 • Just add milk and butter
 • Makes 10 moist, flaky biscuits
 • Serve ‘em alongside Zatarain’s Gumbo or any hearty soup
 • No artificial flavors or colors, no preservatives, no partially hydrogenated oils
 • Made-from-scratch taste in half the time
368a45534c0b437d8e840e83033ad308.ingredient_text:
ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC
ACID), BUTTERMILK POWDER, LEAVENING (SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BICARBONATE, CORN STARCH, MONOCALCIUM PHOSPHATE),
DEXTROSE & SALT.

0cf1ac91084549ffb28086d640ae1931.title: Zatarain’s® Honey Butter Cornbread Mix
0cf1ac91084549ffb28086d640ae1931.description:
From the dinner table to the breakfast table, there’s no sweeter way to serve a meal than with Zatarain’s Honey Butter Cornbread Mix. Made with real honey and simple ingredients, this moist, golden cornbread is a must-have side for brunching and traditional New Orleans meals like Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice.
 • Just add butter, milk and egg
 • Makes moist, sweet cornbread or 12 corn muffins 
 • Serve with Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice or a pot of Zatarain’s Gumbo
 • No artificial flavors or colors, no preservatives, no partially hydrogenated oils
 • Authentic southern flavor from Zatarain’s, the leader in authentic New Orleans flavor since 1889
0cf1ac91084549ffb28086d640ae1931.ingredient_text:
INGREDIENTS: ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC
ACID), SUGAR, YELLOW CORN MEAL, SOYBEAN OIL, LEAVENING (SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BICARBONATE, CORN STARCH,
MONOCALCIUM PHOSPHATE), SALT, HONEY & XANTHAN GUM.

88e37074e0c540d3ac89bfd5af6b1831.title: Zatarain’s® Cheddar Jalapeño Cornbread Mix
88e37074e0c540d3ac89bfd5af6b1831.description:
Heat things up at the dinner table with sharp and spicy Cheddar and jalapeño cornbread. With a few simple mix-ins, you can create homemade flavor with ease. Serve this golden cornbread NOLA-style with Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice, as a Sunday brunch side or on its own as a savory, anytime snack. Feelin’ creative? Add ingredients like Andouille sausage or crumbled, cooked bacon and make it all your own.
 • Just add Cheddar cheese,  butter, milk and egg
 •  Makes moist, savory cornbread or 12 corn muffins
 •  Serve with Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice or a pot of Zatarain’s Gumbo
 •  No artificial flavors or colors; no preservatives; no partially hydrogenated oils
 •  Authentic southern flavor from Zatarain’s, the leader in authentic New Orleans flavor since 1889

9ce1db3df34c432f924d8bbb76bdc1e8.title: ZATARAIN'S® Salad Olives
9ce1db3df34c432f924d8bbb76bdc1e8.description: Our salad olives are made with the highest quality manzanilla olives and minced pimento. They’re a flavorful addition to an antipasto and other salads or as a topping on your favorite sandwiches, like a New Orleans muffuletta.
9ce1db3df34c432f924d8bbb76bdc1e8.ingredient_text: MANZANILLA OLIVES, WATER, SALT, MINCED PIMIENTOS, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM ALGINATE, GUAR GUM, CALCIUM CHLORIDE, AND POTASSIUM SORBATE.

ef23eb0cf3e749f5937a6ad441b77c58.title: ZATARAIN'S® Stuffed Olives - Jumbo
ef23eb0cf3e749f5937a6ad441b77c58.description: We took our queen olives and stuffed them with big, flavorful pieces of minced pimento. These large plump olives are great on their own, in recipes or as a garnish in a martini.
ef23eb0cf3e749f5937a6ad441b77c58.ingredient_text: QUEEN OLIVES, WATER, SALT, MINCED PIMIENTOS, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM ALGINATE, GUAR GUM, CALCIUM CHLORIDE AND POTASSIUM SORBATE.

7b5af3235907440ebb9c66888e14baac.title: ZATARAIN'S® Stuffed Olives
7b5af3235907440ebb9c66888e14baac.description: These manzanilla olives are stuffed with minced pimento, then cured for that classic, tangy olive flavor. Add them to salads, put them on pizza or include them in recipes. There’s nothing you can’t do with our traditional stuffed olives.
7b5af3235907440ebb9c66888e14baac.ingredient_text: MANZANILLA OLIVES, WATER, SALT, MINCED PIMIENTOS, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM ALGINATE, GUAR GUM, CALCIUM CHLORIDE AND POTASSIUM SORBATE.

ffe73f37a2a148a3aecbd3a19beb724f.title: ZATARAIN'S® Cocktail Olives
ffe73f37a2a148a3aecbd3a19beb724f.description: Zatarain’s Cocktail Olives add just the right amount of olive flavor to martinis, Bloody Marys and other drinks.
ffe73f37a2a148a3aecbd3a19beb724f.ingredient_text: Manzanilla Olives, Water, Salt, Lactic Acid and potassium sorbate.

0f553480025244c0ad2da3a3ca39615e.title: ZATARAIN'S® Pitted Olives
0f553480025244c0ad2da3a3ca39615e.description: Imported from Spain, these pitted manzanilla olives have a rich, briny flavor. Slice them up for salads and pizza, or you can stuff them with garlic or blue cheese to make your own treats.
0f553480025244c0ad2da3a3ca39615e.ingredient_text: Manzanilla Olives, Water, Salt, Lactic Acid and potassium sorbate.

6edee2f510c64bf4acac312728bf6dd0.title: ZATARAIN'S® Queen Olives - Jumbo
6edee2f510c64bf4acac312728bf6dd0.description: These large queen olives have jumbo-sized flavor. Have them as a snack or pair them with meats and cheeses for a delicious appetizer for company.
6edee2f510c64bf4acac312728bf6dd0.ingredient_text: OLIVES, WATER, SALT, LACTIC ACID AND POTASSIUM SORBATE.

81bfbe63db034f35a8007e51a312a7a7.title: Zatarain’s® Cajun Hot Sauce
81bfbe63db034f35a8007e51a312a7a7.description:
Bring on the heat with Zatarain’s Cajun Hot Sauce. An authentic blend of aged red peppers, Cajun spices and real, large pieces of garlic make for the perfect blend of heat and flavor you can taste and see. It’s versatile enough for everything from jambalaya to gumbo, eggs and wings!
 • Unique, balanced blend of flavor and heat
 • Made with real aged red peppers, Cajun spices and garlic
 • Add to New Orleans favorites like Zatarain’s Red Beans and Rice, Gumbo and Jambalaya
 • Kick up the taste of eggs, chicken wings, seafood and more
 • Authentic flavor from Zatarain’s, the leader in authentic New Orleans flavor since 1889
81bfbe63db034f35a8007e51a312a7a7.ingredient_text:
AGED RED PEPPERS, DISTILLED
VINEGAR, SALT, NATURAL FLAVOR, GARLIC &
XANTHAN GUM.

20e360c0d8954dcd8b36af203d458535.title: ZATARAIN'S® Prepared Horseradish
20e360c0d8954dcd8b36af203d458535.description: This creamy prepared horseradish has just the right amount of kick. Use it as a spread on sandwiches, as a sauce for your prime rib, in a Bloody Mary, or with just about anything that could use that classic horseradish flavor.
20e360c0d8954dcd8b36af203d458535.ingredient_text: Horseradish, vinegar, water, soybean oil, salt, artificial flavor, egg, sugar, sodium metabisulfite & sodium benzoate (as preservatives), cellulose gum, xanthan gum, citric acid, spices, high fructose corn syrup, lemon juice concentrate, and calcium disodium EDTA (retains product freshness).

d9d59ec8103844c1b7629583fa25381a.title: ZATARAIN'S® Hearty Spicy Brown Mustard
d9d59ec8103844c1b7629583fa25381a.description: We took our famous Creole Mustard and kicked it up a notch. We added diced onions and a touch of sugar for a subtly sweet and spicy take on the flavor you love.
d9d59ec8103844c1b7629583fa25381a.ingredient_text: WATER, DISTILLED VINEGAR, BROWN MUSTARD SEED, SUGAR, ONION, SALT, PAPRIKA, XANTHAN GUM, AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

d31f7ebefb0a49e49da764c930d7c510.title: ZATARAIN'S® New Orleans Yellow Mustard
d31f7ebefb0a49e49da764c930d7c510.description: There’s nothing typical about this yellow mustard. We jazzed it up with a special blend of Louisiana seasonings that goes great on hamburgers, hot dogs, sandwiches or anything you like.
d31f7ebefb0a49e49da764c930d7c510.ingredient_text: DISTILLED VINEGAR, WATER, MUSTARD SEED, SALT, TURMERIC, XANTHAN GUM, AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

752f554db48b4a5995dd75c09e3ae4ce.title: ZATARAIN'S® Creole Mustard
752f554db48b4a5995dd75c09e3ae4ce.description: Zatarain’s Creole Mustard is one of the original products introduced by Emile Zatarain in the late 1800s, and it’s been a New Orleans favorite ever since. It is a coarse, stone-ground mustard with a uniquely vibrant flavor that has earned its place on New Orleans tables and on the city’s best po’boys.
752f554db48b4a5995dd75c09e3ae4ce.ingredient_text: VINEGAR, WATER, BROWN MUSTARD SEED, SALT, XANTHAN GUM.

922213beb5a04362a644b44a988d5d60.title: ZATARAIN'S® Jambalaya Cup
922213beb5a04362a644b44a988d5d60.description: New in 2016! Classic New Orleans Jambalaya is now ready in just 3 ½ minutes. This easy-to-make single serving is perfect for lunch at the office or an after-school snack.
922213beb5a04362a644b44a988d5d60.ingredient_text: RICE, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, YEAST EXTRACT, GARLIC, ONION, SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING CHILI PEPPER, PAPRIKA, RED PEPPER), POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, SEA SALT, SUGAR CALCIUM STEARATE (TO MAKE FREE FLOWING), AND CARAMEL COLOR.

53a15413b5a84e46b6ffbf8565fd43fe.title: ZATARAIN'S® Enriched Long Grain Parboiled Rice
53a15413b5a84e46b6ffbf8565fd43fe.description: Use in your favorite casserole dishes, salad recipes or top with Zatarain's Gumbo. Perfect every time. Never sticky, it's always separate and fluffy. These sizes are available in local grocery stores; 16oz. (7142908175) and 32oz. 7142908145.
53a15413b5a84e46b6ffbf8565fd43fe.ingredient_text: LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE ENRICHED WITH FERRIC ORTHOPHOSPHATE (IRON), NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE (THIAMINE), AND FOLATE.

86526da222494307bdd36670adf8103a.title: ZATARAIN'S® Red Beans & Rice Cup
86526da222494307bdd36670adf8103a.description: New in 2016! Our Red Beans and Rice Cups are for flavor lovers on-the-go. They’re fast, easy, delicious and ready in 3 ½ minutes.
86526da222494307bdd36670adf8103a.ingredient_text: RICE, RED BEAN, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, SALT, YEAST EXTRACT, SEA SALT, GARLIC, ONION, CALCIUM STEARATE (TO MAKE FREE FLOWING), TORULA YEAST, DEXTROSE, CARAMEL COLOR, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), AND NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR (INCLUDING HICKORY SMOKE FLAVOR).

dbed898a81f74fc9b65f3fe1913a503e.title: ZATARAIN'S® Black Beans & Rice Cup
dbed898a81f74fc9b65f3fe1913a503e.description: New in 2016! Grab a Black Beans and Rice Cup and you're 3 ½ minutes away from a satisfying dish that combines Creole Louisiana and Caribbean flavors.
dbed898a81f74fc9b65f3fe1913a503e.ingredient_text: RICE, BLACK BEANS, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, POTATO, POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), SEA SALT, YEAST EXTRACT, ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), GARLIC, CALCIUM STEARATE ADDED (TO MAKE FREE FLOWING), SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), TORULA YEAST, SALT, CARAMEL COLOR, DEXTROSE, DISTILLED VINEGAR, AND NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR (INCLUDING NATURAL HICKORY SMOKE FLAVOR).

ccd1cf0384624f29a0c1da3b19edf4df.title: ZATARAIN'S® Dirty Rice Cup
ccd1cf0384624f29a0c1da3b19edf4df.description: New in 2016! Zatarain’s Dirty Rice Cups pack all of the flavor with less of the waiting around. Just add water, stir, microwave 3 ½ minutes and enjoy. It’s dirty rice – quick and dirty.
ccd1cf0384624f29a0c1da3b19edf4df.ingredient_text: RICE, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, ONION, GARLIC, SALT, YEAST EXTRACT, RED BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING CHILI PEPPER, PAPRIKA, RED PEPPER), POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, CALCIUM STEARATE (TO MAKE FREE FLOWING), SEA SALT, CARAMEL COLOR, AND DEXTROSE.

02e15ca8d6ea4581b8aee334bd420585.title: ZATARAIN'S® Scampi Pasta Dinner Mix
02e15ca8d6ea4581b8aee334bd420585.description: The fun of Italian pasta and the flavor of New Orleans come together in our Scampi Pasta Dinner Mix. Simply add chicken, sausage or shrimp to complete this easy-to-make meal that everyone will love.
02e15ca8d6ea4581b8aee334bd420585.ingredient_text: Enriched Macaroni Product (Durum Wheat Flour, Niacin, Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Enriched Bleached Wheat Flour (Flour, Niacin, Iron, Thiamine, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Salt, Onion, Spices (Including Paprika, Red Pepper), Garlic, Yeast Extract, Soy Sauce (Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Corn Syrup Solids, Salt), Vinegar, Molasses, Modified Corn Starch, Corn Starch, Lemon Puree, Disodium Inosinate And Guanylate (Flavor Enhancers), Sugar, Dextrose, Natural Flavor, Caramel Color, And Lemon Juice.

da6984af47374533973093144a34ec2f.title: ZATARAIN'S® Southern Stroganoff Pasta Dinner Mix

f78160c6c5d3434b983d216eb02c321f.description: A quintessential New Orleans dish, traditionally prepared on Mondays when a long stovetop simmer gave home cooks time to do laundry. Today, red bean lovers rely on Zatarain’s for classic flavor in a fraction of the time. Enjoy Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice as a main course or side dish. Supplement with sausage, ham or pork chops, or hold the meat and have a tasty vegetarian meal. However you prepare it, Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice is hearty but not heavy, packed full of flavor and an instant crowd-pleaser.

81292eb91be94010be5b507bc31618e6.title: ZATARAIN'S® Reduced Sodium Black Beans and Rice
81292eb91be94010be5b507bc31618e6.description:
No single culture owns beans and rice. It’s a natural pairing that likely developed independently in different parts of the world. Our Black Beans and Rice is rooted in the Caribbean, where the combination of savory black beans and fluffy rice is a daily staple.




Zatarain’s Reduced Sodium Black Beans and Rice is flavorful and goes great with a variety of meats, but is hearty enough to stand alone as a meatless entrée. This comes with precooked beans and is ready in less than 30 minutes.
81292eb91be94010be5b507bc31618e6.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), BLACK BEANS, ONION, SALT, POTATO, SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, DEXTROSE, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), YEAST EXTRACT, POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, GARLIC, TORULA YEAST, CARAMEL COLOR, VINEGAR, AND NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR (INCLUDING NATURAL HICKORY SMOKE FLAVOR).

2b5b1495c17d4ef1816dd50754886240.title: ZATARAIN'S® Reduced Sodium Jambalaya Mix
2b5b1495c17d4ef1816dd50754886240.description:
Creole jambalaya was born in New Orleans in the 18th century when Spanish settlers tried to re-create their beloved paella using Louisiana ingredients. Today it’s a local staple, common from music festivals to Mardi Gras parties to quiet weeknight meals.
And there’s a reason why you’ll find boxes of Zatarain’s Reduced Sodium Jambalaya Mix in so many New Orleans pantries: It delivers classic jambalaya flavor with 25% less sodium than the original and is incredibly easy to prepare. Just add sausage, chicken, ham, seafood, veggies – whatever you’d like to make it a meal.
2b5b1495c17d4ef1816dd50754886240.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SEASALT, SPICES (INCLUDING PAPRIKA, RED PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER), RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, YEAST EXTRACT, GARLIC, SALT, AND CARAMEL COLOR.

fd60473deb054f5eba7d731102eff5ea.title: ZATARAIN'S® Mexican Rice with Pinto Beans
fd60473deb054f5eba7d731102eff5ea.description:
Weeknight dinners call for convenient side dishes, like Zatarain’s Mexican Rice with Pinto Beans. Loaded with the bold flavors of garlic, onion and red and green bell pepper, it makes a savory side to chicken, beef and pork, or a hearty meal all on its own. Prepped in the microwave or on the stove, it’s sure to be a family favorite.
  • Long grain rice and pinto beans seasoned with a carefully crafted blend of onion, garlic and a hint of tomato
  • Enjoy it as an entrée or side dish paired with your favorite protein
  • Prepare on the stovetop or in the microwave
  • Gluten-free, no artificial flavors and no MSG
  • 3 grams of fiber per serving
fd60473deb054f5eba7d731102eff5ea.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), PINTO BEANS, ONION, SALT, GARLIC, TOMATO, SPICES (INCLUDING ANNATTO, TURMERIC), TAPIOCA MALTODEXTRIN, SUGAR, YEAST EXTRACT, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, BROWN SUGAR & NATURAL FLAVOR.

feea453df6cc4bf88af6170ce77f73a0.description:
Rice is a major Louisiana crop and a kitchen staple. This beloved dish evolved as home cooks discovered that adding spices and leftover meat would yield rice that tastes a whole lot better – even if it looks a little “dirty.”
Dirty rice is infused with flavors of onion and bell pepper. The dish is traditionally prepared with giblets, but Zatarain’s Reduced Sodium Dirty Rice Mix is delicious with ground beef, ground pork, ground turkey or any other meat of your choosing.

83b75a973788479c962de9d6b6a5efd5.description:
For centuries, wild rice sustained indigenous peoples across North America who found the grain growing in the shallows of lakes and slow-moving streams. Today wild rice is prized for its nutty flavor and high nutritional value.


Try dressing up Zatarain’s Long Grain & Wild Rice Mix with sliced mushrooms, bell peppers, onions and grilled chicken for a light and refreshing meal, perfect for any time of year.

743fed3aba1b40b6b165ee734f7609cb.description:
Yellow rice appears nightly on dinner plates across New Orleans as a flavorful substitute for plain white rice. This popular mix elevates yellow rice with the addition of real broccoli and works perfectly as a side dish or as the foundation of a tasty casserole.


On its own, Zatarain’s Yellow Rice With Broccoli is easy to make and pairs perfectly with a range of meats and vegetables. Or try amping it up with pimientos, peas, lime juice, onion, cumin and garlic powder to create an exciting Cuban-style side dish.

b35cc7d320314d9fb59eb5b22e966d40.title: ZATARAIN'S® Yellow Rice
b35cc7d320314d9fb59eb5b22e966d40.description: Yellow rice, or arroz amarillo in Spanish, is a culinary staple in nearly every Latin American culture. It is commonly served as a simple side dish or, more famously, simmered with chicken and other ingredients to create arroz con pollo. This savory side dish boasts an exciting blend of flavors that includes turmeric, onion and red pepper. Zatarain’s Yellow Rice is simple to prepare, cooks to fluffy perfection every time, and presents a beautiful complement to a range of meats and vegetables. Try it with chicken and asparagus, or pork chops and green beans. Yellow Rice will be your new favorite trick for quick weeknight meals.

671c2acf0b314c9bb81163b1286db721.title: ZATARAIN'S® Smothered Chicken Rice Mix
671c2acf0b314c9bb81163b1286db721.description: Smothered Chicken Rice Mix is a rich blend of parboiled rice, gravy and savory spices that make a New Orleans-style meal in 25 minutes. Simply spoon chicken over rice and serve.
671c2acf0b314c9bb81163b1286db721.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NAICIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC), ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SALT, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, WHEAT FLOUR, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE (FLAVOR ENHANCER), SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPERCHILE PEPPER AND TURMERIC), GARLIC, YEAST EXTRACT, CARAMEL COLOR, SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), SUGAR, HYDROLYZED CORN GLUTEN AND SOY PROTEIN, DISODIUMINOSINATE AND GUANYLATE(FLAVOR ENHANCERS), NATURAL FLAVOR AND SULFITING AGENTS.

9d606c5ac8144a8c876430314c4c0789.title: ZATARAIN'S® Rice Pilaf
9d606c5ac8144a8c876430314c4c0789.description: Pilaf is an ancient dish with variations found across Central Asia, the Middle East, India, Eastern Europe and the Caribbean. Despite wide-ranging recipes, a hallmark of rice pilaf is grains that are distinct, perfectly tender and infused with flavor. Zatarain’s Rice Pilaf uses a long grain rice and orzo combination enhanced by onion, garlic, and red and green bell peppers to make a simple but flavorful side dish. Serve with your favorite chicken, beef or seafood entrée for a complete, tasty meal.
9d606c5ac8144a8c876430314c4c0789.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ORZO PASTA (ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), WHEAT BRAN, TOMATO), SALT, GARLIC, SUGAR, ONION, YEAST EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING TURMERIC, RED PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER, PAPRIKA),  NATURAL FLAVOR, BROWN SUGAR & EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA.

085e12578a2942d3a16d4cdf0a659c0a.title: ZATARAIN'S® Cheddar Broccoli Rice
085e12578a2942d3a16d4cdf0a659c0a.description:
Broccoli and cheddar are a comforting combination that works deliciously in virtually any dish. From soups to casseroles, the union of sharp cheddar and real broccoli makes a satisfying meal for kids and adults.


Use Zatarain’s Cheddar Broccoli Rice as the base ingredient for a tasty, creamy soup or party-size casserole that’s sure to please any crowd. Be creative when crafting a side dish or a full, hearty meal.
085e12578a2942d3a16d4cdf0a659c0a.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), WHITE CHEDDAR CHEESE (MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES) WHEY, ONION, BROCCOLI, ONION, CORN STARCH, ROMANO CHEESE (PART-SKIM COW'S MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), YEAST EXTRACT, SALT, PARMESAN CHEESE (PART SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), GARLIC, SUGAR, SPICES (INCLUDING CHILI PEPPER, RED PEPPER, CUMIN), BUTTERMILK POWDER, ANNATTO, NATURAL FLAVOR & EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA.

f54098a3be194ef49987ac0982d2e6f2.title: ZATARAIN'S® Southern Barbecue Rice Mix
f54098a3be194ef49987ac0982d2e6f2.description: Southern BBQ Rice Mix is easy to make with just the right blend of seasonings for a great-tasting side. Simply add chicken and serve.
f54098a3be194ef49987ac0982d2e6f2.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), SUGAR, SEA SALT, TOMATO, TORULA YEAST,ONION, GARLIC, YEAST EXTRACT, SPICES (INCLUDING  RED PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER), SALT,  MOLASSES, CARAMEL COLOR, VINEGAR, NATURAL FLAVOR (INCLUDING HICKORY SMOKE), EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, TAMARIND AND ASCORBIC ACID.

28b23b82e3dc4aa29fd6f85edffdd5b3.title: ZATARAIN'S® Caribbean Rice Mix
28b23b82e3dc4aa29fd6f85edffdd5b3.description:
New Orleans is often described as the northernmost point of the Caribbean – so significant is the island influence on the city’s cuisine and culture. Celebrate the connection in your home with this enticing blend of sweet fruit, savory vegetable and exotic spice flavors.
Zatarain’s Caribbean Rice Mix combines sweet pineapple and coconut with onion, bell pepper, garlic and just right amount of spices like curry and turmeric. Perfect with shrimp, chicken or on its own as a side, this popular rice mix captures the authentic taste of New Orleans with an exotic twist.
28b23b82e3dc4aa29fd6f85edffdd5b3.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), SUGAR, ONION, COCONUT, SALT, PINEAPPLE, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING MUSTARD, TURMERIC, RED PEPPER), GARLIC, YEAST EXTRACT, GREEN ONION, TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT), NATURAL FLAVOR & SULFITING AGENT.

e65237373f054ccbac9ada9a0ebc8659.title: ZATARAIN'S® Chicken Flavor Rice
e65237373f054ccbac9ada9a0ebc8659.description:
There’s just something about chicken and rice. The two ingredients find themselves paired in cuisines all over the world, and with good reason – the combination is hearty, wholesome and comforting. One bite can warm you from the inside out.


This is a side dish that’s flavorful and versatile. Although chicken is in the name, Zatarain's Chicken Flavor Rice pairs well with pork, beef, seafood and, of course, chicken. Quick and easy to prepare, it’s a simple, satisfying dish everyone will enjoy.
e65237373f054ccbac9ada9a0ebc8659.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SEA SALT, RED BELL PEPPER, GARLIC, SUGAR, SALT, YEAST EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, AND CORN PROTEIN, SPICES (INCLUDING TURMERIC, RED PEPPER AND CHILE PEPPER), CHICKEN, CHICKEN FAT, AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

c63b8313671d4d0281f8839a5d03ed3d.title: ZATARAIN'S® Spanish Rice
c63b8313671d4d0281f8839a5d03ed3d.description: More than 1,500 years ago, North African immigrants brought rice to Spain, where the crop thrived. It wasn’t long before Spanish cooks were simmering rice with onions, bell pepper, garlic and tomatoes to create what is known in the U.S. as Spanish rice. Spanish rice is popular for its flavor and versatility. Simply add fresh tomatoes to Zatarain’s Spanish Rice and serve alongside steak, chicken or any Latin American-inspired entrée.
c63b8313671d4d0281f8839a5d03ed3d.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SALT, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), SUGAR, YEAST EXTRACT, TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT) & GARLIC.

4260ad17d20b43bc84d402b5dd3c2937.title: ZATARAIN'S® Creamy Parmesan Rice Mix
4260ad17d20b43bc84d402b5dd3c2937.description:
Italian immigrants were influential in shaping the culture and cuisine of New Orleans. This Creamy Parmesan Rice Mix is a hat tip to those culinary forebears who enriched our city’s collective menu with traditional Italian ingredients, techniques and recipes.


Prepare as directed on the box and serve alongside grilled chicken or shrimp. Or just after cooking, toss in fresh vegetables like spinach and halved cherry tomatoes. However you choose to prepare Zatarain’s Creamy Parmesan Rice, you’ve found an indulgent new dish you’ll want to make again and again.
4260ad17d20b43bc84d402b5dd3c2937.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), BUTTERMILK, WHEY, CORN STARCH, PARMESAN CHEESE (PART SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), PALM OIL, CREAM CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK & CREAM, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, CAROB BEAN GUM), GARLIC, SALT, LACTOSE, NONFAT DRY MILK, PARMESAN CHEESE (CULTURED PART-SKIM COW'S MILK, SALT, ENZYMES), ROMANO CHEESE (PART-SKIM COW'S MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT ENZYMES), ONION, YEAST EXTRACT, SPICES AND HERBS (INCLUDING PARSLEY, CHILI PEPPER, TURMERIC), TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT), NATURAL FLAVOR, SODIUM CASEINATE, SUGAR & EXTRACTIVES OF ANNATTO.

935e197dfcdf4059a7a06dcb52eac76f.title: ZATARAIN'S® Cilantro Lime Rice
935e197dfcdf4059a7a06dcb52eac76f.description: Cilantro was one of many crops Spanish settlers introduced to Mexican culture centuries ago. The herb was quickly embraced, as it appealed to the local palate and married well with Mexican staple ingredients. A popular resulting flavor combination is on display in our Cilantro Lime Rice. For fajitas, tacos, enchiladas, burritos and many à la carte proteins, Zatarain’s Cilantro Lime Rice is an ideal complement. Liven up your weeknight meals with this quick and easy, flavor-packed side dish.
935e197dfcdf4059a7a06dcb52eac76f.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING CILANTRO, TURMERIC), YEAST EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, LIME JUICE CONCENTRATE, ORGANIC CANE SUGAR, GARLIC, ONION, BROWN SUGAR, NATURAL FLAVOR, EXTRACTIVES OF CILANTRO & LIME OIL.

2df38aacbd4742c0a64da669c29abd89.title: ZATARAIN'S® Black Beans and Rice
2df38aacbd4742c0a64da669c29abd89.description: No single culture owns beans and rice. It’s a natural pairing that likely developed independently in different parts of the world. Our Black Beans & Rice is rooted in the Caribbean, where the combination of savory black beans and fluffy rice is a daily staple. Zatarain’s Black Beans & Rice is flavorful but not spicy and goes great with a variety of meats, but is hearty enough to stand alone as a meatless entrée. This comes with precooked beans and is ready in less than 30 minutes.
2df38aacbd4742c0a64da669c29abd89.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), BLACK BEANS, SALT, POTATO, ONION,&NBSP;ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), YEAST EXTRACT, TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT), RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, TORULA YEAST, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), MALTED BARLEY, FLOUR, GARLIC, NATURAL FLAVOR (INCLUDING HICKORY SMOKE) & EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA.

1074a0989a0844528daa50eec42b3624.title: ZATARAIN'S® Black Eyed Peas & Rice Mix
1074a0989a0844528daa50eec42b3624.description:
A key ingredient in dishes across the American South, the black-eyed pea is thought to bring good luck, especially when served on New Year’s Day. Enjoy our version of Hoppin’ John, the traditional dish of black-eyed peas and rice.


Try adding ham or bacon to Zatarain’s Black-Eyed Peas and Rice and serving with a side of collard, turnip or mustard greens. Whether enjoyed as an entrée or side dish, the bold flavors of Zatarain’s Black-Eyed Peas and Rice are sure to be the main event at your dinner table.
1074a0989a0844528daa50eec42b3624.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), BLACK-EYED PEAS, SALT, ONION, TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT), RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, YEAST EXTRACT, GARLIC, TORULA YEAST, YEAST EXTRACT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), DISTILLED VINEGAR & NATURAL FLAVOR.

b8164cfb37cb4411abc3827ea9960b77.title: ZATARAIN'S® Bourbon Chicken Flavored Rice
b8164cfb37cb4411abc3827ea9960b77.description:
Inspired by the French Quarter, the grand old neighborhood known for exquisite dining and a carefree spirit, this Bourbon Chicken Flavored Rice delivers a tantalizing balance of sweet and savory flavors that makes it a mealtime favorite in any neighborhood.
Zatarain’s Bourbon Chicken Flavored Rice is a bold compliment to any meal. Use it as a side to liven up a simple grilled chicken breast, or stir in a mixture of fresh vegetables. However you prepare it, you’ve found a flavorful, satisfying new addition to your weekly dinner lineup.
b8164cfb37cb4411abc3827ea9960b77.ingredient_text: Enriched Long Grain Parboiled Rice (Rice, Iron, Niacin, Thiamine Mononitrate, Folic Acid), Sugar, Onion, Garlic, Brown Sugar, Tomato, Yeast Extract, Molasses (Refinery syrup, refiners molasses, caramel color), salt, spices (including red pepper, chili pepper, turmeric), torula yeast, caramel color, vinegar solids, hydrolyzed soy protein and corn protein, natural flavor, calcium stearate (to make free flowing), extractives of paprika, chicken, silicon dioxide (added to make free flowing), chicken fat, whiskey solids (contains barley & rye gluten), and ascorbic acid.

e00a62244893457f873c37b11230e266.title: ZATARAIN'S® Dirty Brown Rice Mix
e00a62244893457f873c37b11230e266.description:
Rice is a major Louisiana crop and a kitchen staple. This beloved dish evolved as home cooks discovered that adding spices and leftover meat would create rice that tastes a whole lot better – even if it looks a little “dirty.” 


Dirty rice is infused with the flavors of onion and bell pepper. The dish is traditionally prepared with giblets, but Zatarain’s Dirty Brown Rice Mix is delicious with ground beef, ground pork, ground turkey or any other meat of your choosing.
e00a62244893457f873c37b11230e266.ingredient_text: LONG GRAIN PARBOILED BROWN RICE, ONION, SALT, RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, GARLIC, YEAST EXTRACT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), SOY SAUCE, (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), CARAMEL COLOR, AND PAPRIKA.

a11f0080794d4125899173e56d9948bb.title: ZATARAIN'S® Cajun Chicken Flavored Rice
a11f0080794d4125899173e56d9948bb.description:
The first Cajuns arrived in south Louisiana in 1765, bringing with them a French culinary heritage and a resourceful spirit. They took what their new home gave them – local produce, seafood and game – and created a new cuisine that’s now known far and wide for big, unique flavors.
Based on a classic Cajun recipe, Zatarain’s Cajun Chicken Flavored Rice Mix delivers big Cajun flavor without too much spice. You’ll notice hints of Cajun seasoning with natural chicken flavor and savory vegetables like onion, bell pepper and garlic. Add a pound of boneless, skinless chicken breast to serve your family a complete meal that would be at home at any address in Cajun Country.
a11f0080794d4125899173e56d9948bb.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE ( RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, GARLIC, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING PARSLEY, PAPRIKA, CHILI PEPPER, RED PEPPER, TURMERIC), SALT, SUGAR, YEAST EXTRACT, BROWN SUGAR, NATURAL FLAVOR & CHICKEN POWDER.

03457135c49648e9876234254394a7f2.title: ZATARAIN'S® Family Size Yellow Rice Mix
03457135c49648e9876234254394a7f2.description:
Yellow rice, or arroz amarillo in Spanish, is a culinary staple in nearly every Latin American culture. It is commonly served as a simple side dish or, more famously, simmered with chicken and other ingredients to create arroz con pollo.
This savory side dish boasts an exciting blend of flavors that includes turmeric, onion and red pepper. Zatarain’s Family Size Yellow Rice is simple to prepare, cooks to fluffy perfection every time, and presents a beautiful complement to a range of meats and vegetables. Try it with chicken and asparagus or pork chops and green beans. Yellow Rice will be your new favorite trick for quick weeknight meals. Family Size means six servings per box – 50% more than regular size boxes.
03457135c49648e9876234254394a7f2.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SALT, YEAST EXTRACT, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, SUGAR, GARLIC, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, SPICES (INCLUDING TURMERIC, RED PEPPER), BROWN SUGAR & NATURAL FLAVOR.

9eb8f45b9c4c48a0af8ba802f75a806e.title: ZATARAIN'S® Brown Rice Jambalaya Mix
9eb8f45b9c4c48a0af8ba802f75a806e.description:
Creole Jambalaya was born in New Orleans in the 18th century when Spanish settlers tried to re-create their beloved paella using Louisiana ingredients. Today it’s a local staple, common from music festivals to Mardi Gras parties to quiet weeknight meals.


In New Orleans, people rely on Zatarain’s Brown Rice Jambalaya Mix for classic jambalaya flavor with the addition of whole grain brown rice. The mix is quick and easy to prepare. Just add sausage, chicken, ham, seafood, veggies – whatever you’d like to make it a meal.
9eb8f45b9c4c48a0af8ba802f75a806e.ingredient_text: LONG GRAIN PARBOILED BROWN RICE, ONION, SALT, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING PAPRIKA, RED PEPPER), YEAST EXTRACT, GARLIC, & TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT).

54f058d18c38492aa1405afe15d34a70.title: ZATARAIN'S® Garlic and Herb Rice Mix
54f058d18c38492aa1405afe15d34a70.description: Bring the true flavor of New Orleans to your dinner table in minutes with Zatarain’s Garlic & Herb Rice Mix. Add ground beef for a complete dinner your family will love.
54f058d18c38492aa1405afe15d34a70.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), GARLIC, SALT, ONION, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE (FLAVOR ENHANCER), YEAST EXTRACT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER AND TURMERIC), SUGAR, SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), WHEAT BRAN, HYDROLYZED CORN GLUTEN, AND SOY PROTEIN, TOMATO, DISODIUM INOSINATE & GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

7909479794d746b082e9701779a31ba9.title: ZATARAIN'S® Garden Vegetable Rice Mix
7909479794d746b082e9701779a31ba9.description:
In our hometown, fresh vegetables form the foundation of our most iconic dishes. Here, we’ve combined long grain rice with peas, tomatoes, carrots, green onion, bell pepper and garlic to make a side dish as vibrant as a New Orleans backyard garden.


Serve Zatarain’s Garden Vegetable Rice Mix as a side, or create a delicious, filling meal by adding chicken, pork or shrimp. Try it as the filling for stuffed bell peppers, or let it cool and toss with fresh vegetables and a vinaigrette for a light, refereshing rice salad.
7909479794d746b082e9701779a31ba9.ingredient_text: Enriched Long Grain Parboiled Rice (Rice, Iron, Niacin, Thiamine Mononitrate,Folic Acid), Onion, Salt, Red & Green Bell Pepper, Garlic, Carrot,Yeast Extract, Sugar, Celery, Tomato, Spices (Including Black Pepper, Red Pepper), Green Onions, Vegetables (Onion, Carrot, Tomato, Pepper, Celery), Disodium Inosinate And Disodium Guanylate (Flavor Enhancers), And Turmeric.

a31d1be2897f40d1948500f3ab3e1b93.title: ZATARAIN'S® Family Size Dirty Rice Mix
a31d1be2897f40d1948500f3ab3e1b93.description:
Rice is a major Louisiana crop and a kitchen staple. This beloved dish evolved as home cooks discovered that adding spices and leftover meat would yield rice that tastes a whole lot better – even if it looks a little “dirty.” 
Dirty rice is infused with flavors of onion and bell pepper. The dish is traditionally prepared with giblets, but Zatarain’s Family Size Dirty Rice Mix is delicious with ground beef, ground pork, ground turkey or any other meat of your choosing. Family Size means six servings per box – 50% more than regular size boxes.
a31d1be2897f40d1948500f3ab3e1b93.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SALT, POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, GARLIC, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, YEAST EXTRACT & SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER, PAPRIKA).

aedf0a8a73f24b2e9bcf0c13f77ffbfa.title: ZATARAIN'S® Garlic Butter Flavored Rice Mix
aedf0a8a73f24b2e9bcf0c13f77ffbfa.description:
Garlic and butter are two ingredients you are likely to find in every New Orleans kitchen. This versatile rice mix accents rich butter flavor with a hint of garlic, creating a simple accompaniment to virtually any main dish.


And while the dish is traditionally prepared as a side, try combining fresh vegetables and grilled chicken with Zatarain’s Garlic Butter Flavored Rice Mix for a filling and flavorful one-pot meal. This adaptable rice mix lets you exercise your creativity.
aedf0a8a73f24b2e9bcf0c13f77ffbfa.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE ( RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), GARLIC, CORN MALTODEXTRIN, SALT, YEAST EXTRACT, ONION, NATURAL FLAVOR(INCLUDING BUTTER), (MILK), SUGAR, SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), DISODIUM INOSINATE & GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), TURMERIC, SOY LECITHIN, AND EXTRACTIVES OF ANNATTO.

efd9c98aee474161a3a2f76524750385.title: ZATARAIN'S® Gumbo Mix with Rice
efd9c98aee474161a3a2f76524750385.description:
In New Orleans, there are as many different varieties of gumbo as there are people who make it. Zatarain’s Gumbo Mix with Rice is a flavorful foundation, making it easy to create classics like shrimp & okra or chicken & sausage gumbo – or to invent a new signature gumbo of your own!
Gumbo is the quintessential dish of New Orleans, a city of diverse influences that formed a new culture greater than the sum of its parts. Those same influences are reflected in every bowl of gumbo. The dish is a rich and flavorful melting pot, just like its hometown.
efd9c98aee474161a3a2f76524750385.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (FLOUR, MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), SALT, RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, WHEAT FLOUR, ONION, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER), GARLIC, YEAST EXTRACT, SOY SAUCE (HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SALT), MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE(FLAVOR ENHANCER), AND CARAMEL COLOR.

9ad8d9e49ae440e38b1f236ca747df83.title: ZATARAIN'S® Family Size Red Beans & Rice Mix
9ad8d9e49ae440e38b1f236ca747df83.description:
A quintessential New Orleans dish, traditionally prepared on Mondays when a long stovetop simmer gave home cooks time to do laundry. Today, red bean lovers rely on Zatarain’s for classic flavor in a fraction of the time.
Enjoy Zatarain’s Red Beans & Rice as a main course or side dish. Supplement with sausage, ham or pork chops, or hold the meat and have a tasty vegetarian meal. However you prepare it, Zatarain’s Family Size Red Beans & Rice Mix is hearty but not heavy, packed full of flavor and an instant crowd-pleaser. Family Size means six servings per box – 50% more than regular size boxes.
9ad8d9e49ae440e38b1f236ca747df83.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), RED BEANS, ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT & MALT BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), ONION, CORN STARCH, SALT, TAMARI SOY SAUCE (SOYBEAN, SALT), RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, YEAST EXTRACT, TORULA YEAST, GARLIC, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, SPICES (INCLUDING PAPRIKA, RED PEPPER), NATURAL FLAVOR (INCLUDING HICKORY SMOKE) & EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA.

d3de03275869499bb58a2aaccc251d12.title: ZATARAIN'S® Family Size Rice Pilaf
d3de03275869499bb58a2aaccc251d12.description:
Pilaf is an ancient dish with variations found across Central Asia, the Middle East, India, Eastern Europe and the Caribbean. Despite wide-ranging recipes, a hallmark of rice pilaf is grains that are distinct, perfectly tender and infused with flavor.
Zatarain’s Family Size Rice Pilaf uses a long grain rice and orzo combination enhanced by onion, garlic, and red and green bell peppers to make a simple but flavorful side dish. Serve with your favorite chicken, beef or seafood entrée for a complete, tasty meal. Family Size means six servings per box – 50% more than regular size boxes.
d3de03275869499bb58a2aaccc251d12.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ORZO PASTA (ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), WHEAT BRAN, TOMATO, SALT, GARLIC, SUGAR, ONION, YEAST EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, SPICES (INCLUDING TURMERIC, RED PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER, PAPRIKA), NATURAL FLAVOR, BROWN SUGAR & EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA.

75214b3f0f9e4b9d93775438c1c28472.title: ZATARAIN'S® Dirty Rice Mix, Original
75214b3f0f9e4b9d93775438c1c28472.description: Rice is a major Louisiana crop and a kitchen staple. This beloved dish evolved as home cooks discovered that adding spices and leftover meat would create rice that tastes a whole lot better – even if it looks a little “dirty.” Dirty rice is infused with flavors of onion and bell pepper. The dish is traditionally prepared with giblets, but Zatarain’s Dirty Rice Mix is delicious with ground beef, ground pork, ground turkey or any other meat of your choosing.
75214b3f0f9e4b9d93775438c1c28472.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION,  SALT, POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, GARLIC, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, YEAST EXTRACT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER & PAPRIKA).
75214b3f0f9e4b9d93775438c1c28472.servings_size: 1/4 cup dry mix (38g) = Makes 1 cup prepared

e513194f7786428d907f3cc41ee6f1ea.title: ZATARAIN'S® Family Size Jambalaya Mix, Original
e513194f7786428d907f3cc41ee6f1ea.description:
Creole jambalaya was born in New Orleans in the 18th century when Spanish settlers tried to recreate their beloved paella using Louisiana ingredients. Today it’s a local staple, common from music festivals to Mardi Gras parties to quiet weeknight meals.
And there’s a reason why you’ll find boxes of Zatarain’s Family Size Jambalaya Mix in so many New Orleans pantries: It delivers classic jambalaya flavor and is incredibly easy to prepare. Just add sausage, chicken, ham, seafood, veggies – whatever you’d like to make it a meal. Family Size means six servings per box, 50% more than regular size boxes.
e513194f7786428d907f3cc41ee6f1ea.ingredient_text: ENRICHED LONG GRAIN PARBOILED RICE (RICE, IRON, NIACIN, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, FOLIC ACID), ONION, SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING PAPRIKA, RED PEPPER, CHILE PEPPER), RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPER, YEAST EXTRACT, GARLIC, AND CARAMEL COLOR.

High in fiber, Big Easy Wild Brown Rice is similar to those found in many down home restaurants in New Orleans. Serve it up as a meatless entrée or alongside your choice of meat or seafood.

Cure those cravings for crispy, golden seafood with the ultimate New Orleans Secret – Zatarain’s Fish-Fri. One bite of this Crispy Cajun variety and you’ll be beggin’ for seconds. The crunchy combo of cornmeal, corn flour and spices like garlic, red pepper and paprika makes for a spicy, irresistible coating on shrimp and fish.
 • All-purpose seafood breading with a spicy kick for shrimp and fish
 • Versatile enough for deep frying, pan frying or baking 
 • Made with cornmeal, corn flour, lemon juice and a blend of garlic, red pepper and paprika
 • No MSG
 • An easy solution for crispy, flavorful seafood

140fdf9477ce40d2a455309ec67345b9.description: A true New Orleans classic, Zatarain’s Dirty Rice with Beef & Pork is a delicious meal that’s ready in just minutes. A meal in itself, this flavorful dish has the perfect blend of ingredients for a great-tasting New Orleans meal.
140fdf9477ce40d2a455309ec67345b9.ingredient_text: COOKED LONG GRAIN RICE, WATER, BEEF, PORK, GREEN BELL PEPPERS, DEHYDRATED MINCED ONIONS, MARGARINE (LIQUID AND HYDROGENATED SOYBEAN OIL, WATER, SALT, VEGETABLE MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, BHA & BHT ADDED TO PROTECT FLAVOR, VITAMIN A PALMITATE AND VITAMIN D3 ADDED), GREEN ONIONS, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, DEHYDRATED BELL PEPPERS, YEAST EXTRACT, SALT, GRANULATED GARLIC, SPICES, DISODIUM INOSINATE AND DISODIUM GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), WHEAT GLUTEN, SUGAR, CARAMEL COLOR, PAPRIKA, CHILI POWDER (CHILI PEPPER, SPICES, SALT, GARLIC POWDER), MALTODEXTRIN (FROM CORN) AND NATURAL FLAVOR, SOYBEAN OIL, DEXTROSE.

6db402098e6545d09cc0a383d8ca9051.title: ZATARAIN'S® Family Sized Blackened Chicken Alfredo
6db402098e6545d09cc0a383d8ca9051.description: Need to feed a crowd? Zatarain’s Blackened Chicken Alfredo is a delicious pasta meal that’s big on flavor and ready in just minutes. Try this unique New Orleans twist on a real favorite: penne pasta and zesty, creamy cheese sauce with blackened chicken.

9182b705ceb8402ea7d02982d0fbb3c4.title: ZATARAIN'S® Bourbon Chicken Pasta for 2
9182b705ceb8402ea7d02982d0fbb3c4.description: Dining for two? Jazz up your freezer – and table – with the authentic flavor of Zatarain’s. Our Bourbon Chicken Pasta features roasted white meat chicken tenders in a creamy bourbon sauce over twisted pasta ribbons. Ready in just 12 minutes.
9182b705ceb8402ea7d02982d0fbb3c4.ingredient_text: COOKED ENRICHED PASTA (WATER, ENRICHED DURUM SEMOLINA [DURUM SEMINOLA WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON SULFATE, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID]), WATER, COOKED GRILL-MARKED CHICKEN BREASTS STRIPS WITH RIB MEAT (CHICKEN BREAST WITH RIB MEAT, WATER, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH, SALT, SODIUM PHOSPHATE), HALF AND HALF (MILK, CREAM), KENTUCKY BOURBON (WITH SALT), SWEET DAIRY WHEY, CHEESE FLAVORS (A DEHYDRATED BLEND OF PARMESAN AND ROMANO CHEESES [ PART-SKIM COW'S MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES], WHEY, BUTTERMILK SOLIDS, PARTIALLY HYDROGENATED SOYBEAN OIL, SODIUM PHOSPHATE, SALT), CREAM CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK AND CREAM, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, CAROB BEAN GUM), HEAVY CREAM SAUCE (SHORTENING POWDER [SOYBEAN OIL, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, SODIUM CASEINATE, MONO & DIGLYCERIDES], CORN MALTODEXTRIN, SWEET CREAM SOLIDS, SALT, SUGAR, GARLIC POWDER, LEMON JUICE POWDER [CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, LEMON JUICE, LEMON OIL], NATURAL BUTTER FLAVOR), MARGARINE (LIQUID AND HYDROGENATED SOYBEAN OIL, WATER, SALT, VEGETABLE MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, BETA CAROTENE [COLOR], VITAMIN A PALMITATE ADDED), DRY BUTTERMILK, GREEN ONIONS, STABLIZER (CORN STARCH, GUM ARABIC, XANTHAN GUM, GUAR GUM), NONFAT MILK SOLIDS (NONFAT MILK, WHEY SOLIDS [LACTOSE], VITAMIN A AND D3), CORN MALTODEXTRIN, YEAST EXTRACT, SEA SALT, PARSLEY FLAKES, SPICES, GRANULATED GARLIC, DEXTROSE, CHILI POWDER (CHILI PEPPERS, SPICES, SALT, GARLIC POWDER), PAPRIKA, SUGAR, GRANULATED ONION.

02e2365225e74f74a53c49484b5f8819.title: ZATARAIN'S® Chicken & Sausage Jambalaya for 2
02e2365225e74f74a53c49484b5f8819.description: Dining for two? Zatarain’s now brings the authentic flavor of New Orleans from the freezer to the table in just 10 minutes. Our Chicken & Sausage Jambalaya has long grain rice with grilled white-meat chicken, andouille sausage, onions, bell peppers and just the right amount of spices.
02e2365225e74f74a53c49484b5f8819.ingredient_text: COOKED LONG GRAIN RICE, WATER, BELL PEPPERS, CHICKEN BREAST STRIPS WITH RIB MEAT (CHICKEN BREAST MEAT WITH RIB MEAT, WATER, MODIFIED POTATO STARCH, SALT, SODIUM PHOSPHATE), COOKED ANDOUILLE SAUSAGE (PORK, WATER, DEHYDRATED GARLIC AND ONION, SALT, SPICES, PAPRIKA, SUGAR, SODIUM PHOSPHATE, SMOKE FLAVORING, SASSAFRAS, SODIUM ERYTHORBATE, SODIUM NITRITE), ONIONS, MARGARINE (LIQUID AND HYDROGENATED SOYBEAN OIL, WATER, SALT, VEGETABLE MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, BETA CAROTENE [COLOR], VITAMIN A PALMITATE ADDED), MODIFIED CORN STARCH, PORK BASE (ROASTED PORK MEAT AND NATURAL JUICES, SALT, CORN SYRUP, YEAST EXTRACT, WHEY [MILK], CHICKEN FAT, CORN OIL, SUGAR, NATURAL FLAVOR, WINE AND CARAMEL COLOR), PAPRIKA, GRANULATED GARLIC, YEAST EXTRACT, SEA SALT, SPICES, CHILI POWDER (CHILI PEPPER, SPICES, SALT, GARLIC POWDER), STABILIZER (CORN STARCH, GUM ARABIC, XANTHAN GUM, GUAR GUM).

c837f6cc089842449801c22c435e1418.title: ZATARAIN'S® Creole Seasoning
c837f6cc089842449801c22c435e1418.description: There’s nothing quite like Zatarain’s Creole Seasoning. A blend of spices that could only come from New Orleans offers a deliciously different flavor than your standard salt and pepper. Shake it on pretty much anything from meats and seafood to soups, salads and eggs.
c837f6cc089842449801c22c435e1418.ingredient_text: SALT, DEXTROSE, SPICES (INCLUDING  RED PEPPER, PAPRIKA), GARLIC, SUGAR, ONION, DISODIUM INOSINATE AND GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, AND NATURAL FLAVORS.

9c161995ddad40cbaa742ea75601792a.title: ZATARAIN'S® Chopped Green Onions
9c161995ddad40cbaa742ea75601792a.description: Always have green onions on hand when a recipe calls for them. One tablespoon of Zatarain’s Chopped Green Onions equals four tablespoons of fresh green onions.

ccc09b10a91f4741b50188b5790e68ff.title: ZATARAIN'S® Diced Onions
ccc09b10a91f4741b50188b5790e68ff.description: Zatarain’s Diced Onions are a convenient substitute for fresh onions in roasts, stuffings, fried foods and more. Just add cold water and let stand for 10-15 minutes and use just like you would fresh onion.

ee439737d537407b921e6bfabb0c266a.title: ZATARAIN'S® Root Beer Concentrate
ee439737d537407b921e6bfabb0c266a.description: Emile Zatarain’s first product in 1889 was root beer made in uptown New Orleans, and the company still packages its root beer extract to this day. This concentrate comes with directions for old-fashioned bottled preparation, or easy preparation by the pitcher.
ee439737d537407b921e6bfabb0c266a.ingredient_text: WATER, CARAMEL COLOR, ALCOHOL, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, SULFITING AGENTS, AND FD&C RED #40 LAKE.

5dda2b1fa5d143f6886693c0cd6dd69c.title: ZATARAIN'S® Parsley Flakes
5dda2b1fa5d143f6886693c0cd6dd69c.description: Need parsley in a pinch? Zatarain’s Parsley Flakes add color and flavor to dishes without needing to keep fresh parsley on hand. One teaspoon of dried parsley equals two sprigs of fresh parsley.

b463e3c56fa64478b17b43e869cc23da.title: ZATARAIN'S® Gumbo Filé
b463e3c56fa64478b17b43e869cc23da.description: Filé, dried leaves of the sassafras tree, is an essential seasoning for gumbo but can be used to jazz up any kind of soup. Shake a little on top of your gumbo or soups just before serving as a delicate seasoning and thickener.

244727e17b324068afa9f2b3220b661e.title: ZATARAIN'S® Big & Zesty Garlic & Herb Creole Seasoning
244727e17b324068afa9f2b3220b661e.description: Jazz up salads, soups, chicken, beef or seafood with this perfect blend of garlic and herbs.
244727e17b324068afa9f2b3220b661e.ingredient_text: SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER & OREGANO), GARLIC, ONION, SUGAR, SOYBEAN OIL, DISODIUM INOSINATE & DISODIUM GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), SOY LECITHIN, EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, EXTRACTIVES OF GARLIC, AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

f7af48acbecf417caf312b652b1a0abc.title: ZATARAIN'S® Big & Zesty Blackened Creole Seasoning
f7af48acbecf417caf312b652b1a0abc.description: Traditional New Orleans blackened seasoning gets even bigger and bolder with Zatarain’s Big & Zesty Blackened Creole Seasoning. Red pepper, garlic, onion, paprika and other spices are combined to make a seasoning that can add a kick to almost any dish.
f7af48acbecf417caf312b652b1a0abc.ingredient_text: SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), GARLIC, ONION, DISODIUM INOSINATE & DISODIUM GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

5716ce2e295c4af7a35553188995675a.title: ZATARAIN'S®  Cayenne Pepper
5716ce2e295c4af7a35553188995675a.description: Cayenne pepper is what gives most Louisiana dishes their characteristic flavor. So who better to get your cayenne pepper from than Zatarain’s, the authority on New Orleans and Louisiana flavor.

584e219ab59048eaaffb9909e978ab39.title: ZATARAIN'S® Bell Peppers
584e219ab59048eaaffb9909e978ab39.description: Bell Peppers are one-third of the New Orleans cooking staple called the holy trinity (onions, bell peppers and celery), so always having them on hand is a must. When a recipe calls for them, one tablespoon of Zatarain’s Bell Pepper equals two tablespoons of fresh chopped peppers.

80d9ff4d5ff646a5987ea3a9f0653bf6.title: ZATARAIN'S® Blackened Seasoning
80d9ff4d5ff646a5987ea3a9f0653bf6.description: We perfected the New Orleans classic blackened seasoning with our own unique blend of spices. Use it as a dry rub for fish, chicken, steak or other meats to give them that one-of-a-kind blackened flavor. A couple of shakes can also jazz up almost any recipe.
80d9ff4d5ff646a5987ea3a9f0653bf6.ingredient_text: SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING CHILI PEPPER, RED PEPPER, PAPRIKA), MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE (AS FLAVOR ENHANCER), ONION AND GARLIC.

83c49287b0594c61936812dddd38f18b.title: ZATARAIN'S® Big & Zesty Original Creole Seasoning
83c49287b0594c61936812dddd38f18b.description: Our Big & Zesty Creole Seasoning has flavor you can see and taste. This unique blend of New Orleans spices can be sprinkled on top of soups and salads to add a burst of flavor, or you can add it to recipes to bring some New Orleans flavor to your favorite dishes.
83c49287b0594c61936812dddd38f18b.ingredient_text: SALT, ONION, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), GARLIC, RED & GREEN BELL PEPPER, SUGAR, DISODIUM INOSINATE & DISODIUM GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCERS), CELERY, SOYBEAN OIL, EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, AND NATURAL FLAVOR.

11a37124fbac4933ba576c6b1568d884.title: ZATARAIN'S® Shrimp Creole Base
11a37124fbac4933ba576c6b1568d884.description: Shrimp Creole is a New Orleans favorite made with tomatoes, onion, peppers, celery and, of course, shrimp. Zatarain’s Shrimp Creole Base makes it easy. Just add your vegetables and shrimp to have a real homemade New Orleans meal.
11a37124fbac4933ba576c6b1568d884.ingredient_text: Enriched Wheat Flour (Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Malted Barley Flour, Dehydrated Vegetables (Onion, Bell Pepper, Celery, Green Onion, Parsley), Salt, Soybean Oil (TBHQ Added as a Preservative), Wheat Flour, Monosodium Glutamate, Garlic, Yeast Extract, Soy Sauce (100% Soybean), Thiamine Hydrochloride, Soybean Oil, Black Pepper, Cayenne Pepper, Silicon Dioxide (Flow Agent), Spices.

f33927a64b874383a7a58aab084b2396.title: ZATARAIN'S® White Bean Seasoning Mix
f33927a64b874383a7a58aab084b2396.description: A mild and savory recipe you'll find in many of the more down home restaurants of New Orleans. This mix makes a great meatless entrée or an accompaniment to a variety of meats. Just add your favorite beans (Great Northern, navy or lima) and you’ll have a meal in 30 minutes.
f33927a64b874383a7a58aab084b2396.ingredient_text: ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, ONION, SALT, BELL PEPPER, GARLIC, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE, SOY SAUCE (100% SOYBEAN), YEAST EXTRACT, DEXTROSE, SOYBEAN OIL (TBHQ ADDED AS A PRESERVATIVE), THIAMINE HYDROCHLORIDE, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, SPICES, WHEAT FLOUR, CAYENNE PEPPER, BLACK PEPPER, TORULA YEAST, NATURAL SMOKE FLAVOR.

df53f2a84f764483a8fe8493b7d1adcf.title: ZATARAIN'S® Gumbo Base
df53f2a84f764483a8fe8493b7d1adcf.description: No time to make a roux? Start with Zatarain’s Gumbo Base and you’ll have a delicious gumbo in no time. Just throw in your favorite meat or seafood and pour over rice for a traditional Creole gumbo.
df53f2a84f764483a8fe8493b7d1adcf.ingredient_text: ENRICHED BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR (BLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR, MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN,REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), ONION, WHEAT FLOUR, SALT, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, SOYBEAN OIL, RED AND GREEN BELL PEPPERS, AUTOLYZED YEAST EXTRACT, SOY SAUCE (100% SOYBEANS), SPICES, GARLIC, CARAMEL COLOR, SILICON DIOXIDE(AS ANTICAKING AGENT), DISODIUM INOSINATE AND DISODIUM GUANYLATE (FLAVOR ENHANCER), AND SULFITING AGENTS.

57da18f559ef42c6a996d341cac5776a.title: ZATARAIN'S® Red Bean Seasoning Mix
57da18f559ef42c6a996d341cac5776a.description: This is all the seasoning you need to make homemade red beans and rice, the classic Monday night meal in New Orleans. Cook your beans and add this flavorful mix of spices that will have you craving red beans every night of the week.
57da18f559ef42c6a996d341cac5776a.ingredient_text: ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, DEHYDRATED VEGETABLES (ONION, BELL PEPPER), SALT, WHEAT FLOUR, SPICES, GARLIC, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE, SOYBEAN OIL (TBHQ ADDED AS A PRESERVATIVE), SILICON DIOXIDE (FLOW AGENT), CAYENNE PEPPER, DEXTROSE, YEAST EXTRACT, SOY SAUCE (100% SOYBEAN), THIAMINE HYDROCHLORIDE, PAPRIKA, TORULA YEAST, NATURAL SMOKE FLAVOR, BLACK PEPPER.

20e0362af7a74d04aa21b8ef440aeb6e.title: ZATARAIN'S® Pro Boil
20e0362af7a74d04aa21b8ef440aeb6e.description: This is our ultimate boil seasoning for crawfish, shrimp and crab, developed for professionals and the people who boil like them. Pro Boil is a convenient sack-size blend of seasonings with five times more spice and flavor than our regular boil bag.
20e0362af7a74d04aa21b8ef440aeb6e.ingredient_text: Salt, Spices (including Red Pepper), Dextrose, Citric Acid, Natural Flavor, Soy Lecithin, Lemon Juice Concentrate, Extractives of Paprika, Extractives of Garlic, and Lemon Oil.

f0351864791f4f62bedc71802d435692.title: ZATARAIN'S® Etouffee Base
f0351864791f4f62bedc71802d435692.description: Etouffee is a classic Creole and Cajun dish of smothered shrimp or crawfish with rice. One box of Zatarain’s Etouffee Base has all the seasoning you need – just add shrimp or crawfish and you’ll have a New Orleans-style meal in no time.
f0351864791f4f62bedc71802d435692.ingredient_text: Enriched Wheat Flour (Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid,) Malted Barley Flour, Dehydrated Vegetables (Onion, Bell Pepper, Celery, Green Onion), Modified Corn Starch, Salt, Wheat Flour, Soybean Oil (TBHQ Added as a Preservative)Yeast Extract, Soy Sauce (100% Soybean), Thiamine Hydrochloride, Spices, Monosodium Glutamate, Silicon Dioxide (Flow Agent), Garlic, Cayenne Pepper, Black Pepper, Chili Powder.

6e2055ae18d841a79c95e2ec869d10ce.title: ZATARAIN'S® Extra Spicy Crawfish, Shrimp and Crab Boil
6e2055ae18d841a79c95e2ec869d10ce.description: Control how much spice and seasoning you want with Zatarain’s Extra Spicy Crawfish, Shrimp & Crab Boil in a jar.
6e2055ae18d841a79c95e2ec869d10ce.ingredient_text: SALT, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER) DEXTROSE, NATURAL FLAVOR, EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE (FLAVOR ENHANCER), AND LEMON JUICE SOLIDS.

c77b3794a7f34918983d2c7eef7a0315.title: ZATARAIN'S® Shrimp and Crab Boil - Lemon
c77b3794a7f34918983d2c7eef7a0315.description: Give your shrimp and crab that citrusy flavor you love with Zatarain’s Lemon Liquid Shrimp & Crab Boil.
c77b3794a7f34918983d2c7eef7a0315.ingredient_text: WATER, POLYSORBATE 80, EXTRACTIVES OF RED PEPPER, LEMON, BAY, CLOVE, BLACK PEPPER, THYME AND MARJORAM, ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, SODIUM BENZOATE (TO PROTECT TASTE), CITRIC ACID.

dd0105645d224c98941d2d31c84404e6.title: ZATARAIN'S® Shrimp and Crab Boil - Garlic & Onion
dd0105645d224c98941d2d31c84404e6.description: Zatarain’s Garlic & Onion Liquid Shrimp & Crab Boil is a special blend of seasonings that gives you great tasting seafood every time without the guesswork.
dd0105645d224c98941d2d31c84404e6.ingredient_text: WATER, POLYSORBATE 80, EXTRACTIVES OF: RED PEPPER, ONION, GARLIC, BAY, CLOVE, BLACK PEPPER, THYME, AND MARJORAM, ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, SODIUM BENZOATE (TO PROTECT TASTE), CITRIC ACID.

03a6e1d534e442deaa5dc56eaef53023.title: ZATARAIN'S® Concentrated Shrimp and Crab Boil
03a6e1d534e442deaa5dc56eaef53023.description: Our liquid Concentrated Shrimp & Crab Boil is made for boiling your favorite seafood but it can be used to give any dish some added spice.
03a6e1d534e442deaa5dc56eaef53023.ingredient_text: WATER, POLYSORBATE 80, EXTRACTIVES OF: RED PEPPER, BAY, CLOVE, BLACK PEPPER, THYME, MARJORAM AND ARTIFICIAL SPICE FLAVORS.

384c67083688436d9d07ee4fcecb81cd.title: ZATARAIN'S® Crawfish, Shrimp and Crab Boil - Complete
384c67083688436d9d07ee4fcecb81cd.description: Zatarain’s Complete Crawfish, Shrimp & Crab Boil is all the spice and seasoning you need to get boiling. Just add to the pot with your favorite seafood and vegetables for a good old-fashioned Louisiana boil.
384c67083688436d9d07ee4fcecb81cd.ingredient_text: SALT, DEXTROSE, SPICES (INCLUDING RED PEPPER), NATURAL FLAVOR, EXTRACTIVES OF PAPRIKA, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE (FLAVOR ENHANCER), LEMON PUREE, SUGAR, AND LEMON JUICE.

d97b1b76f3eb4ab0b8b8dd4145219e14.title: ZATARAIN'S® Crawfish, Shrimp and Crab Boil - In a Bag
d97b1b76f3eb4ab0b8b8dd4145219e14.description: The original Zatarain’s Crawfish, Shrimp & Crab Boil with seven spices and seasonings in a convenient boil-in bag. One bag, plus salt to taste, perfectly seasons up to four pounds of crawfish and shrimp or up to one dozen crabs. This is the secret ingredient in everyone’s favorite boil.
d97b1b76f3eb4ab0b8b8dd4145219e14.ingredient_text: MUSTARD SEED, CORIANDER SEED, CAYENNE PEPPER, BAY LEAVES, DILL SEED, ALLSPICE.
d97b1b76f3eb4ab0b8b8dd4145219e14.servings_size: 1 bag is sufficient for 4 pounds of shrimp, 4 pounds of crawfish or 1 dozen crabs.

c3264bdcce774a01aa4ad3bb4a5f6995.title: ZATARAIN'S® Extra Spicy Crawfish, Shrimp and Crab Boil - In Bag
c3264bdcce774a01aa4ad3bb4a5f6995.description: Like your crawfish, shrimp and crab to have a little more spice? Try our extra spicy boil in a bag. We add more cayenne to the mix to give it an extra kick you’ll love.
c3264bdcce774a01aa4ad3bb4a5f6995.ingredient_text: CAYENNE PEPPER, CORIANDER, BLACK PEPPER, MUSTARD SEED, BAY LEAVES, DILL SEED, ALLSPICE.

c7562cf9f52e4924bfb4a01dbedf8549.title: Cajun Injector Creole Garlic Injectable Marinade
c7562cf9f52e4924bfb4a01dbedf8549.description: The Original Award Winner guaranteed to bring life to any meal. Great on Beef, Pork, or Wild Game. Comes with our Original Injector for our unique delivery system of deep injecting meats.
c7562cf9f52e4924bfb4a01dbedf8549.ingredient_text: WATER, VINEGAR, MOLASSES, CORN SYRUP, SALT, RED PEPPERS, DEHYDRATED GARLIC, HYDROLYZED SOYBEAN AND CORN PROTEIN, CARAMEL COLOR, DEHYDRATED ONION, SPICES, XANTHAN GUM, ANCHOVIES, TAMARINDS, LEMON OIL, LESS THAN 0.1% SODIUM BENZOATE AS A PRESERVATIVE

8da82dd59956487e8e4ee2f5309ea819.title: Cajun Injector Creole Butter Injectable Marinade
8da82dd59956487e8e4ee2f5309ea819.description: The name says it all. For chicken, pork, turkey, & lamb. A buttery concoction with just the right amount of spice. Comes with our Original Injector for our unique delivery system of deep injecting meats.
8da82dd59956487e8e4ee2f5309ea819.ingredient_text: WATER, SALT, RED PEPPERS, SPICES, DEHYDRATED GARLIC, NATURAL BUTTER FLAVORING, XANTHAN GUM, CITRIC ACID, LESS THAN 0.1% SODIUM BENZOATE AS A PRESERVATIVE.

b39a58c60d3548739bba0b4395fd9980.title: Cajun Injector Lemon Pepper Quick Shake Seasoning
b39a58c60d3548739bba0b4395fd9980.description: Our wonderful blend of Cajun seasonings, perfect for meats, poultry, fish and vegetables. Add zest to your popcorn, salads, soups and more! Just a sprinkle, just a shake, adds flavor to everything you make.
b39a58c60d3548739bba0b4395fd9980.ingredient_text: SALT, BLACK PEPPER, SUGAR, MALTODEXTRIN, GARLIC, CITRIC ACID, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH, SPICES, ONION, LEMON OIL, SILICON DIOXIDE (TO PREVENT CAKING).

84518e29ce914ee7b231712b759ebd20.title: Cajun Injector Cajun Chicken Fry Mix
84518e29ce914ee7b231712b759ebd20.description: For those who like things with a little heat. Cajun Chicken Fry Mix coats chicken with a crispy crust filled with tasty herbs and spices.
84518e29ce914ee7b231712b759ebd20.ingredient_text: WHEAT FLOUR, CORN FLOUR, SALT, SPICES, GARLIC, ONION, SILICON DIOXIDE (TO PREVENT CAKING, SOYBEAN OIL, CELERY SEED. CONTAINS WHEAT

dd92f3774e9a460195556764215a260d.title: Cajun Injector Southern Style Chicken Fry Mix
dd92f3774e9a460195556764215a260d.description: Our marinade puts great taste on the inside, now taste what we’ve done to the outside! Delicious Fry Mixes that are quick and easy to prepare.
dd92f3774e9a460195556764215a260d.ingredient_text: WHEAT FLOUR, CORN FLOUR, SALT, SPICES, SILICON DIOXIDE (TO PREVENT CAKING), GARLIC, ONION, SOYBEAN OIL, CELERY SEED.

More neutral in flavor than some popular Asian noodles, soft, chewy udon noodles make a perfect pairing for dishes that have strongly flavored ingredients and sauces. And they’re ready in just 8 minutes!


Non-GMO Certified
5 grams of protein per serving
8-minute boiling time 
For use in cold or warm dishes

48f137e7618d4ced8707439005ab7dd4.title: Simply Asia Vietnamese Inspired Pho Beef Broth
48f137e7618d4ced8707439005ab7dd4.description:
This flavorful beef broth spiced with cinnamon, star anise and ginger makes it easy for you to cook Vietnamese-style pho at home. Use it to sauté vegetables or as a base for soups and stews.


5 grams of protein for one cup of broth
Flavor components include cinnamon, star anise and ginger
Add a splash of beef broth while sautéing vegetables

83343b510416468683cefb0fbe5abb49.title: Simply Asia Japanese Inspired Ramen Soy Ginger Chicken Broth
83343b510416468683cefb0fbe5abb49.description:
Treat your family to authentic ramen flavor with this garlicky, gingery chicken broth. This delicious broth provides a versatile and flavorful starter for many of your everyday recipes. Great for sauteeing vegetables or as a base for soups and stews!


5 grams of protein for one cup of broth
Flavor components include cinnamon, star anise and ginger
Tip: Use chicken broth as a base in recipes for soups and stews

These thin, long noodles are at the ready for soups, cold noodle salads and the ultimate Asian comfort dish – ramen noodle soup. Add them to your favorite chicken or veggies recipe. They’re ready in just 5-7 minutes!


Non-GMO Certified
5 grams of protein per serving
5-7 minutes boiling time 
Use immediately after cooking in soups, stir-fry and more

161bd8602ad240da89ca7a84c610a2bb.title: Simply Asia Japanese Style Soba Noodles
161bd8602ad240da89ca7a84c610a2bb.description:
These thin, nutty-to-the-taste noodles are the shining star in cold Japanese salads, complimenting sweet and savory sauces and fresh vegetables. Add them to salads, soups or stir-fry. They’re boiled and ready to serve in just 6 minutes!


Non-GMO Certified
5 grams of protein per serving
6-minute boiling time 
Add soba noodles to salads, soups and stir-fry

4-6 minutes boiling time

2fb527cfd4024b67a9d67f62ddd732d4.description: Esta mezcla de tomates secados al sol, cebolla, pimientos, albahaca, orégano y romero es una manera versátil de añadirle sabor a los mariscos cuando los cocine a la parrilla, en el horno o asados.

781b723d941543189ae52c9d2d6c8e0e.title: McCormick® Lemon Butter Dill Seafood Sauce (salsa para pescados y mariscos con mantequilla, eneldo y limón)
781b723d941543189ae52c9d2d6c8e0e.description: Resalte el exquisito sabor de los mariscos o el pescado con esta salsa para pescados y mariscos con mantequilla, eneldo y limón. El limón, el eneldo y otros sazonadores son mezclados cuidadosamente por los expertos en McCormick para complementar sus pescados y camarones sin opacar su sabor natural para obtener un platillo perfecto cada vez.

54fde5556823497299a14f434e7d65fa.title: McCormick® Santa Fe Style Seafood Sauce (salsa para mariscos estilo Santa Fe)
54fde5556823497299a14f434e7d65fa.description: Esta sabrosa combinación de tomate, ajo, chile, comino, hierbas y jugo de limón es una forma versátil de agregar sabor a los mariscos mientras se cocinan en la parrilla, al horno o se asan.

ece5432b9eb74ac7a09198312d12ae45.description: Esta sabrosa mezcla de pimientos, salsa de chile rojo, tomillo y orégano es una manera versátil de agregarle sabor a sus mariscos cuando los cocine a la parrilla, los hornee o los ase.

c8a4efd2083e4e9f86004219ee2264f4.title: McCormick® Caribbean Citrus Seafood Marinade Mix (preparado de adobo con cítricos para mariscos y pescado estilo caribeño)

cb209e0df46a449986f6f52ca3b0e179.description: Fat Free Lemon Butter Dill Seafood Sauce (salsa sin grasa para pescados y mariscos con sabor a mantequilla, eneldo y limón)

700206d796414892858ac7652a6d41ce.title: McCormick® Golden Dipt® Onion Ring Batter Mix (mezcla para rebozar aros de cebolla, línea Golden Dipt)

La mezcla Golden Dipt® Onion Ring Batter Mix (mezcla para rebozar aros de cebolla, línea Golden Dipt®) combina las harinas y especias de más alta calidad para una cobertura sabrosa que sella los jugos y sabores naturales para obtener aros de cebolla que su familia disfrutará.

c60bba90552a4cdcbf1af5fc05e86e03.title: McCormick® Golden Dipt® Hoy 'n Spicy Chicken Fry Mix (mezcla picante para freír pollo, línea Golden Dipt)

La mezcla justa de especias y sazonadores de esta ligera cubierta crujiente agrega un sabor delicioso que su familia y amigos disfrutarán. Y a usted le encantará lo fácil que es usar las mezclas Golden Dipt, con resultados perfectos todas las veces que las use.
c60bba90552a4cdcbf1af5fc05e86e03.ingredient_text: HARINA DE TRIGO ENRIQUECIDA (HARINA, NIACINA, HIERRO REDUCIDO, MONONITRATO DE TIAMINA, RIBOFLAVINA Y ÁCIDO FÓLICO), SAL, ESPECIAS (INCLUYE CHILE ROJO), GOMA ARÁBIGA, AJO, CEBOLLA, EXTRACTOS DE CHILE ROJO Y EXTRACTOS DE PIMENTÓN ESTILO ESPAÑOL.

ec5e326357fe423ca5afc0f6165af4d1.title: McCormick® Golden Dipt® Funnel Cake Batter Mix (mezcla para buñuelos, línea Golden Dipt)
ec5e326357fe423ca5afc0f6165af4d1.description: McCormick, el experto en sazonadores, le ofrece las mezclas para freír, adobos y salsas de la línea Golden Dipt®. La mezcla Golden Dipt® Funnel Cake Mix (mezcla para buñuelos, línea Golden Dipt) lleva a su casa las mismas delicias que ha probado en las ferias, mientras hace que cocinarlas sea fácil.
